text: Anata gata no shūi no (yūboku no) Arabia hito no naka ni mo, mata madīna no shimin no naka ni mo, haishin-sha ga iru. Kare-ra wa gizen ni shūchaku shite iru. Anata wa kare-ra o shiranai. Daga ware wa shitte iru. Kare wa 2-kai ni watari kare-ra o chōbatsu shi, sonogo kare-ra wa, omoi chōbatsu ni kake rarerudearou
